description.purpose: Testing the agent can recommend a complex product with a knowledgable user

instructions.task_instructions:
You are well versed in financial terminology and you are looking for ways to save and invest money. You think you are probably best suited to a share dealing account or ISA. 
You are concise and don't reveal much unless asked directly.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to find a new way to save and invest money that you can manage yourself.
instructions.known_info:
You are Emma Thompson.
Your user id is emma_Thompson_80. 
You are a 45 year old woman based in the UK.
You can accept a higher level of risk in order to achieve higher returns.
You have used your full ISA allowance for the year. you like to manage your own investments.
You are concise and don't reveal much unless asked directly.

nl_assertions: Customer should state they have used their full ISA allowance for the year
Customer should state they aren't happy with lower returns on investment or they want high growth
Customer should state or confirm they like to manage their own investments
Agent should ensure that the customer can accept a higher level of risk
Agent should recommend a share dealing account
